ggsegKleist: Kleist Atlas for the 'ggseg' Ecosystem

Source: R/ggsegKleist-package.R
ggsegKleist-package.Rd

Historical Kleist functional segregation atlas for the 'ggseg' ecosystem. Provides a unified 'ggseg_atlas' object with both 2D polygon geometry and 3D vertex indices, for use with 'ggseg' and 'ggseg3d'.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://github.com/ggsegverse/ggsegKleist

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/ggsegverse/ggsegKleist/issues
